trans-unit.source: Represents a connection to a SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: 表示到 SQL Server 数据库的连接。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> object represents a unique session to a [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] data source.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>对象表示到唯一的会话[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]数据源。

trans-unit.source: With a client/server database system, it is equivalent to a network connection to the server.
trans-unit.target: 使用客户端/服务器数据库系统，它相当于网络连接到服务器。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> is used together with <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> and <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> to increase performance when connecting to a Microsoft [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] database.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> 使用连同<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>和<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>来提高性能时连接到 Microsoft[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]数据库。

trans-unit.source: For all third-party [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] products, and other OLE DB-supported data sources, use <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection>.
trans-unit.target: 为所有第三方[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]产品和其他支持 OLE DB 的数据源，则使用<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection>。

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>, all properties are set to their initial values.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建的实例<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>，所有属性均都设置为其初始值。

trans-unit.source: For a list of these values, see the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 有关这些值的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> for a list of the keywords in a connection string.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>有关连接字符串中的关键字的列表。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> goes out of scope, it won't be closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>超出范围，则不会关闭。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling `Close` or `Dispose`.
trans-unit.target: 因此，必须显式关闭连接通过调用`Close`或`Dispose`。

trans-unit.source: `Close` and `Dispose` are functionally equivalent.
trans-unit.target: `Close` 和`Dispose`在功能上等效。

trans-unit.source: If the connection pooling value `Pooling` is set to `true` or `yes`, the underlying connection is returned back to the connection pool.
trans-unit.target: 如果连接池值`Pooling`设置为`true`或`yes`，则基础连接返回到连接池。

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, if `Pooling` is set to `false` or `no`, the underlying connection to the server is actually closed.
trans-unit.target: 另一方面，如果`Pooling`设置为`false`或`no`，则实际关闭基础连接到服务器。

trans-unit.source: Login and logout events will not be raised on the server when a connection is fetched from or returned to the connection pool, because the connection is not actually closed when it is returned to the connection pool.
trans-unit.target: 从连接池中提取连接或将连接返回到连接池时，服务器上不会引发登录和注销事件，这是因为在将连接返回到连接池时实际上并没有将其关闭。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [SQL Server Connection Pooling (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[SQL Server 连接池 (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md)。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that connections are always closed, open the connection inside of a `using` block, as shown in the following code fragment.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保始终关闭连接，打开的内部连接`using`阻止，如下面的代码段中所示。

trans-unit.source: Doing so ensures that the connection is automatically closed when the code exits the block.
trans-unit.target: 这样做可确保当代码退出块时自动关闭连接。

trans-unit.source: To deploy high-performance applications, you must use connection pooling.
trans-unit.target: 若要部署高性能应用程序，必须使用连接池。

trans-unit.source: When you use the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] Data Provider for [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)], you do not have to enable connection pooling because the provider manages this automatically, although you can modify some settings.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]数据提供程序[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]，则不需要启用连接池，因为提供程序管理此自动，尽管你可以修改某些设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [SQL Server Connection Pooling (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[SQL Server 连接池 (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md)。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException> is generated by the method executing a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> remains open when the severity level is 19 or less.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException>生成的方法执行<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>、<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>保持打开状态时的严重性级别为 19 或以下。

trans-unit.source: When the severity level is 20 or greater, the server ordinarily closes the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>.
trans-unit.target: 等于或大于 20 的严重性级别时，服务器通常会关闭<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>。

trans-unit.source: However, the user can reopen the connection and continue.
trans-unit.target: 但是，用户可以重新打开连接并继续操作。

trans-unit.source: An application that creates an instance of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> object can require all direct and indirect callers to have sufficient permission to the code by setting declarative or imperative security demands.
trans-unit.target: 创建的实例的应用程序<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>对象可以要求所有直接和间接调用方拥有足够权限的代码通过设置声明性或命令性安全要求。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> makes security demands using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> 发出安全要求使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermission>对象。

trans-unit.source: Users can verify that their code has sufficient permissions by using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermissionAttribute> object.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以验证他们的代码通过使用具有足够的权限<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlClientPermissionAttribute>对象。

trans-unit.source: Users and administrators can also use the [Caspol.exe (Code Access Security Policy Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md) to modify security policy at the machine, user, and enterprise levels.
trans-unit.target: 用户和管理员还可以使用[Caspol.exe （代码访问安全策略工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md)可修改计算机、 用户和企业级别的安全策略。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Security](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a9621d7-8883-4a4f-a874-65e8e09e20a6).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[安全性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a9621d7-8883-4a4f-a874-65e8e09e20a6)。

trans-unit.source: For an example demonstrating how to use security demands, see [Code Access Security and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/code-access-security.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关演示如何使用安全要求的示例，请参阅[代码访问安全性和 ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/code-access-security.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling warning and informational messages from the server, see [Connection Events](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理来自服务器的警告和信息性消息的详细信息，请参阅[连接事件](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md)。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] engine errors and error messages are documented in [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] Books Online.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] 引擎错误和错误消息记录在[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]联机丛书。

trans-unit.source: You can force TCP instead of shared memory.
trans-unit.target: 你可以强制 TCP，而不是共享的内存。

trans-unit.source: You can do that by prefixing tcp: to the server name in the connection string or you can use localhost.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过实现此前缀 tcp： 在连接中的服务器名字符串也可以使用 localhost。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> and a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>和<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> is opened and set as the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Connection%2A> for the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>打开并将其设置为<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Connection%2A>为<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>。

trans-unit.source: The example then calls <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例然后调用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To accomplish this, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A> is passed a connection string and a query string that is a [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)] INSERT statement.
trans-unit.target: 若要实现此目的，<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.ExecuteNonQuery%2A>传递连接字符串和一个查询字符串[!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]INSERT 语句。

trans-unit.source: The connection is closed automatically when the code exits the using block.
trans-unit.target: 在代码退出使用时自动关闭连接块。

trans-unit.source: A connection string that does not use any of the following connection string keywords: <see langword="Integrated Security = true" />, <see langword="UserId" />, or <see langword="Password" />; or that does not use <see langword="ContextConnection = true" />.
trans-unit.target: 不使用以下任何连接字符串关键字的连接字符串：<see langword="Integrated Security = true" />、 <see langword="UserId" />，或 <see langword="Password" />；或不使用 <see langword="ContextConnection = true" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" /> class given a connection string, that does not use <see langword="Integrated Security = true" /> and a <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential" /> object that contains the user ID and password.
trans-unit.target: 初始化给定连接字符串的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" /> 类的新实例，而不使用包含用户识别号和密码的 <see langword="Integrated Security = true" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the access token for the connection.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于连接的访问令牌。

trans-unit.source: The access token for the connection.
trans-unit.target: 用于连接的访问令牌。

trans-unit.source: Starts a database transaction.
trans-unit.target: 开始数据库事务。

trans-unit.source: Starts a database transaction.
trans-unit.target: 开始数据库事务。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the new transaction.
trans-unit.target: 表示新事务的对象。

trans-unit.source: This command maps to the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] implementation of BEGIN TRANSACTION.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将映射到[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]BEGIN TRANSACTION 的实现。

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你必须显式提交或回滚事务使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>或<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To make sure that the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] Data Provider for [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as the one provided by [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 若要确保[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]数据提供程序[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]事务管理模型是否正常运行，请不要使用其他事务管理模型，例如由[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify an isolation level, the default isolation level is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定隔离级别，使用的默认隔离级别。

trans-unit.source: To specify an isolation level with the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> method, use the overload that takes the `iso` parameter (<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 若要指定隔离级别与<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>方法，请使用采用的重载`iso`参数 (<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: The isolation level set for a transaction persists after the transaction is completed and until the connection is closed or disposed.
trans-unit.target: 设置事务的隔离级别仍然保持事务完成后，直到关闭或断开连接。

trans-unit.source: Setting the isolation level to **Snapshot** in a database where the snapshot isolation level is not enabled does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 隔离将级别设置为**快照**不启用快照隔离级别时的数据库中不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The transaction will complete using the default isolation level.
trans-unit.target: 事务将在完成使用的默认隔离级别。

trans-unit.source: If a transaction is started and a level 16 or higher error occurs on the server, the transaction will not be rolled back until the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A> method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 如果启动事务，级别 16 或更高版本的错误发生在服务器上，事务将不会回滚直到<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.Read%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown on **ExecuteReader**.
trans-unit.target: 不引发任何异常**ExecuteReader**。

trans-unit.source: When your query returns a large amount of data and calls `BeginTransaction`, a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException> is thrown because [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] does not allow parallel transactions when using MARS.
trans-unit.target: 当你的查询返回大量的数据和调用`BeginTransaction`、<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException>因为引发[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]使用 MARS 时不允许并行事务。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this problem, always associate a transaction with the command, the connection, or both before any readers are open.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免此问题，始终将关联事务与命令和 / 或连接之前任何读取器处于打开状态。

trans-unit.source: For more information on [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] transactions, see "Explicit Transactions" and "Coding Efficient Transactions" in [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] Books Online.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]事务，请参阅"显式事务"和"编码高效事务"中[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]联机丛书。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> and a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>和<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction>。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 它还演示如何使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>、 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>，和<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Parallel transactions are not allowed when using Multiple Active Result Sets (MARS).
trans-unit.target: 使用多个活动结果集 (MARS) 时，不允许并行事务。

trans-unit.source: Parallel transactions are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持并行事务。

trans-unit.source: The isolation level under which the transaction should run.
trans-unit.target: 事务应在其下运行的隔离级别。

trans-unit.source: Starts a database transaction with the specified isolation level.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的隔离级别启动数据库事务。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the new transaction.
trans-unit.target: 表示新事务的对象。

trans-unit.source: This command maps to the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] implementation of BEGIN TRANSACTION.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将映射到[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]BEGIN TRANSACTION 的实现。

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你必须显式提交或回滚事务使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>或<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To make sure that the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] Data Provider for [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as the one provided by [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 若要确保[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]数据提供程序[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]事务管理模型是否正常运行，请不要使用其他事务管理模型，例如由[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: After a transaction is committed or rolled back, the isolation level of the transaction persists for all subsequent commands that are in autocommit mode (the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] default).
trans-unit.target: 提交或回滚事务后，事务的隔离级别保持不变，是在自动模式下的所有后续命令 ([!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]默认值)。

trans-unit.source: This can produce unexpected results, such as an isolation level of REPEATABLE READ persisting and locking other users out of a row.
trans-unit.target: 这可能会产生意外的结果，如保持和锁定在行外的其他用户 REPEATABLE READ 隔离级别。

trans-unit.source: To reset the isolation level to the default (READ COMMITTED), execute the [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)] SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ COMMITTED statement, or call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> followed immediately by <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 若要重置为默认值 (READ COMMITTED) 的隔离级别，请执行[!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]设置事务隔离级别 READ COMMITTED 语句或调用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>后跟来<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For more information on [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] isolation levels, see "Isolation Levels in the Database Engine" in [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] Books Online.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]隔离级别，请参阅中的"数据库引擎中的隔离级别"[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]联机丛书。

trans-unit.source: For more information on [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] transactions, see "Explicit Transactions" and "Coding Efficient Transactions" in [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] Books Online.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]事务，请参阅"显式事务"和"编码高效事务"中[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]联机丛书。

trans-unit.source: When your query returns a large amount of data and calls `BeginTransaction`, a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException> is thrown because [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] does not allow parallel transactions when using MARS.
trans-unit.target: 当你的查询返回大量的数据和调用`BeginTransaction`、<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException>因为引发[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]使用 MARS 时不允许并行事务。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this problem, always associate a transaction with the command, the connection, or both before any readers are open.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免此问题，始终将关联事务与命令和 / 或连接之前任何读取器处于打开状态。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 它还演示如何使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>、 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>，和<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Parallel transactions are not allowed when using Multiple Active Result Sets (MARS).
trans-unit.target: 使用多个活动结果集 (MARS) 时，不允许并行事务。

trans-unit.target: 不支持并行事务。

trans-unit.target: 事务名称。

trans-unit.target: 以指定的事务名称启动数据库事务。

trans-unit.target: 表示新事务的对象。

trans-unit.source: This command maps to the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] implementation of BEGIN TRANSACTION.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将映射到[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]BEGIN TRANSACTION 的实现。

trans-unit.source: The length of the `transactionName` parameter must not exceed 32 characters; otherwise an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 长度`transactionName`参数不能超过 32 个字符; 否则将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The value in the `transactionName` parameter can be used in later calls to <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> and in the `savePoint` parameter of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Save%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 中的值`transactionName`参数可在更高版本调用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>并在`savePoint`参数<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Save%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你必须显式提交或回滚事务使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>或<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To make sure that the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] Data Provider for [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as the one provided by [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 若要确保[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]数据提供程序[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]事务管理模型是否正常运行，请不要使用其他事务管理模型，例如由[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this problem, always associate a transaction with the command, the connection, or both before any readers are open.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免此问题，始终将关联事务与命令和 / 或连接之前任何读取器处于打开状态。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 它还演示如何使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>、 <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>，和<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Parallel transactions are not allowed when using Multiple Active Result Sets (MARS).
trans-unit.target: 使用多个活动结果集 (MARS) 时，不允许并行事务。

trans-unit.source: Parallel transactions are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持并行事务。

trans-unit.source: The name of the database to use instead of the current database.
trans-unit.target: 要代替当前数据库加以使用的数据库的名称。

trans-unit.source: Changes the current database for an open <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" />.
trans-unit.target: 更改已打开的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" /> 的当前数据库。

trans-unit.source: The value supplied in the `database` parameter must be a valid database name.
trans-unit.target: 中提供的值`database`参数必须是有效的数据库名称。

trans-unit.source: The `database` parameter cannot contain a null value, an empty string, or a string with only blank characters.
trans-unit.target: `database`参数不能包含 null 值、 空字符串或仅有空白字符的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> and displays some of its read-only properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>并显示部分只读属性。

trans-unit.source: The database name is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 数据库名称无效。

trans-unit.source: The connection is not open.
trans-unit.target: 连接未打开。

trans-unit.source: Cannot change the database.
trans-unit.target: 不能更改数据库。

trans-unit.source: Changes the SQL Server password.
trans-unit.target: 更改 SQL Server 密码。

trans-unit.source: The connection string that contains enough information to connect to the server that you want.
trans-unit.target: 包含连接至所需服务器的足够信息的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The connection string must contain the user ID and the current password.
trans-unit.target: 连接字符串必须包含用户 ID 和当前密码。

trans-unit.source: The new password to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的新密码。

trans-unit.source: This password must comply with any password security policy set on the server, including minimum length, requirements for specific characters, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 此密码必须符合服务器上设置的任何密码安全策略，包括最小长度、特定字符要求等等。

trans-unit.source: Changes the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] password for the user indicated in the connection string to the supplied new password.
trans-unit.target: 将连接字符串中指示的用户的 [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] 密码更改为提供的新密码。

trans-unit.source: When you are using [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] on Windows Server, developers can take advantage of functionality that lets the client application supply both the current and a new password in order to change the existing password.
trans-unit.target: 如果要使用[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]Windows 服务器上，开发人员可以利用使客户端应用程序提供当前和新密码才能更改现有密码的功能。

trans-unit.source: Applications can implement functionality such as prompting the user for a new password during initial login if the old one has expired, and this operation can be completed without administrator intervention.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以实现功能，如在初始登录期间提示用户输入新密码，如果旧已过期，并且可以完成此操作，而无需管理员干预。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ChangePassword%2A> method changes the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] password for the user indicated in the supplied `connectionString` parameter to the value supplied in the `newPassword` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ChangePassword%2A>方法更改[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]用户密码所示提供`connectionString`参数中提供的值`newPassword`参数。

trans-unit.source: If the connection string includes the option for integrated security (that is, "Integrated Security=True" or the equivalent), an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果连接字符串将包括集成安全性的选项 (即"集成的安全性 = True"或同等身份)，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To determine that the password has expired, calling the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Open%2A> method raises a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException>.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定的密码已过期，这将调用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Open%2A>方法引发<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException>。

trans-unit.source: In order to indicate that the password that is contained within the connection string must be reset, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException.Number%2A> property for the exception contains the status value 18487 or 18488.
trans-unit.target: 若要指示，则必须重置连接字符串中包含的密码，<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlException.Number%2A>异常的属性包含状态值 18487 或 18488。

trans-unit.source: The first value (18487) indicates that the password has expired and the second (18488) indicates that the password must be reset before logging in.
trans-unit.target: 第一个值 (18487) 指示的密码已过期，而第二个 (18488) 指示在登录之前，必须重置密码。

trans-unit.source: This method opens its own connection to the server, requests the password change, and closes the connection as soon as it has completed.
trans-unit.target: 此方法打开其自己的连接到服务器，请求密码更改，并已完成后立即关闭连接。

trans-unit.source: This connection is not retrieved from, nor returned to, the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] connection pool.
trans-unit.target: 此连接不检索从，也不会返回到，[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]连接池。

trans-unit.target: 下面是更改密码的简单示例：

trans-unit.target: 以下控制台应用程序演示涉及中更改用户的密码，因为当前的密码已过期的问题。

trans-unit.source: The connection string includes the option to use integrated security.
trans-unit.target: 连接字符串包括将使用集成安全性的选项。

trans-unit.source: Or
trans-unit.target: Or

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="newPassword" /> 的长度超过 128 个字符。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="connectionString" /> 或 <paramref name="newPassword" /> 参数为 null。

trans-unit.source: The connection string that contains enough information to connect to a server.
trans-unit.target: 包含连接至服务器的足够信息的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The connection string should not use any of the following connection string keywords: <see langword="Integrated Security = true" />, <see langword="UserId" />, or <see langword="Password" />; or <see langword="ContextConnection = true" />.
trans-unit.target: 不应使用以下任何连接字符串关键字的连接字符串：<see langword="Integrated Security = true" />、 <see langword="UserId" />，或 <see langword="Password" />；或者 <see langword="ContextConnection = true" />。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential" /> 对象。

trans-unit.target: 新密码。

trans-unit.source: <c>newSecurePassword</c> must be read only.
trans-unit.target: <c>newSecurePassword</c> 必须为只读。

trans-unit.source: The password must also comply with any password security policy set on the server (for example, minimum length and requirements for specific characters).
trans-unit.target: 该密码也必须符合服务器上设置的任何密码安全策略（例如：最小长度、特定字符要求）。

trans-unit.source: Changes the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] password for the user indicated in the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 更改 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential" /> 对象指示的用户的 [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] 密码。

trans-unit.source: The connection string contains any combination of <see langword="UserId" />, <see langword="Password" />, or <see langword="Integrated Security=true" />.
trans-unit.target: 连接字符串包含 <see langword="UserId" />、 <see langword="Password" /> 或 <see langword="Integrated Security=true" /> 的任意组合。

trans-unit.source: The connection string contains <see langword="Context Connection=true" />.
trans-unit.target: 连接字符串包含 <see langword="Context Connection=true" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="newSecurePassword" /> is greater than 128 characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="newSecurePassword" /> 的长度超过 128 个字符。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="newSecurePassword" /> is not read only.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="newSecurePassword" /> 不是只读的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="newSecurePassword" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="newSecurePassword" /> 是一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: One of the parameters (<paramref name="connectionString" />, <paramref name="credential" />, or <paramref name="newSecurePassword" />) is null.
trans-unit.target: 其中一个参数（<paramref name="connectionString" />、<paramref name="credential" /> 或 <paramref name="newSecurePassword" />）为 null。

trans-unit.source: Empties the connection pool.
trans-unit.target: 清空连接池。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ClearAllPools%2A> resets (or empties) the connection pool.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ClearAllPools%2A> 重置 （或清空） 的连接池。

trans-unit.source: If there are connections in use at the time of the call, they are marked appropriately and will be discarded (instead of being returned to the pool) when <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A> is called on them.
trans-unit.target: 如果在调用时使用的连接，它们进行相应的标记并且将被放弃 （而不返回到池） 时<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A>对其调用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" /> to be cleared from the pool.
trans-unit.target: 要从池中清除的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" />。

trans-unit.source: Empties the connection pool associated with the specified connection.
trans-unit.target: 清空与指定连接关联的连接池。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ClearPool%2A> clears the connection pool that is associated with the `connection`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ClearPool%2A> 清除与关联的连接池`connection`。

trans-unit.source: If additional connections associated with `connection` are in use at the time of the call, they are marked appropriately and are discarded (instead of being returned to the pool) when <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A> is called on them.
trans-unit.target: 如果其他连接与关联`connection`是在使用中时调用的它们进行相应的标记，将被丢弃 （而不返回到池） 时<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A>对其调用。

trans-unit.source: The connection ID of the most recent connection attempt, regardless of whether the attempt succeeded or failed.
trans-unit.target: 最近连接尝试连接的 ID，无论该尝试是成功还是失败。

trans-unit.source: The connection ID of the most recent connection attempt.
trans-unit.target: 最近连接尝试的连接 ID。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ClientConnectionId%2A> works regardless of which version of the server you connect to, but extended events logs and entry on connectivity ring buffer errors will not be present in [!INCLUDE[sskatmai_r2](~/includes/sskatmai-r2-md.md)] and earlier.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ClientConnectionId%2A> 无论哪个版本的服务器的工作原理你连接到，但扩展的事件日志和上连接环形缓冲区错误项将不会显示在[!INCLUDE[sskatmai_r2](~/includes/sskatmai-r2-md.md)]及更早版本。

trans-unit.source: You can locate the connection ID in the extended events log to see if the failure was on the server if the extended event for logging connection ID is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 你可以扩展的事件日志，以查看是否在服务器上已失败是否启用日志记录连接 ID 的扩展的事件中找到的连接 ID。

trans-unit.source: You can also locate the connection ID in the connection ring buffer ([Connectivity troubleshooting in SQL Server 2008 with the Connectivity Ring Buffer](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=207752)) for certain connection errors.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以连接环形缓冲区中找到的连接 ID ([连接中使用连接环形缓冲区的 SQL Server 2008 的故障排除](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=207752)) 对于某些连接错误。

trans-unit.source: If the connection ID is not in the connection ring buffer, you can assume a network error.
trans-unit.target: 如果连接 ID 不是连接环形缓冲区中，你可以假定网络错误。

trans-unit.source: Closes the connection to the database.
trans-unit.target: 关闭与数据库之间的连接。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred method of closing any open connection.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是关闭任何打开连接的首选方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A> method rolls back any pending transactions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A>方法回滚任何挂起的事务。

trans-unit.source: It then releases the connection to the connection pool, or closes the connection if connection pooling is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它将释放到连接池，连接或关闭的连接，如果禁用连接池。

trans-unit.source: Pending transactions started using [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)] or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> are automatically rolled back when the connection is reset if connection pooling is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 挂起的事务开始使用[!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]或<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>连接重置时，如果启用了连接池时将自动回滚。

trans-unit.source: If connection pooling is off, the transaction is rolled back after `SqlConnection.Close` is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果连接池处于关闭状态，则事务将回滚之后`SqlConnection.Close`调用。

trans-unit.source: Transactions started through <xref:System.Transactions> are controlled through the `System.Transactions` infrastructure, and are not affected by `SqlConnection.Close`.
trans-unit.target: 通过启动事务<xref:System.Transactions>通过控制`System.Transactions`基础结构，而不受`SqlConnection.Close`。

trans-unit.source: An application can call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A> more than one time.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以调用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Close%2A>不止一次。

trans-unit.source: No exception is generated.
trans-unit.target: 不会生成异常。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> goes out of scope, it won't be closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>超出范围，则不会关闭。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling `Close` or `Dispose`.
trans-unit.target: 因此，必须显式关闭连接通过调用`Close`或`Dispose`。

trans-unit.source: `Close` and `Dispose` are functionally equivalent.
trans-unit.target: `Close` 和`Dispose`在功能上等效。

trans-unit.source: If the connection pooling value `Pooling` is set to `true` or `yes`, the underlying connection is returned back to the connection pool.
trans-unit.target: 如果连接池值`Pooling`设置为`true`或`yes`，则基础连接返回到连接池。

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, if `Pooling` is set to `false` or `no`, the underlying connection to the server is closed.
trans-unit.target: 另一方面，如果`Pooling`设置为`false`或`no`，则基础到服务器的连接已关闭。

trans-unit.source: Login and logout events will not be raised on the server when a connection is fetched from or returned to the connection pool, because the connection is not actually closed when it is returned to the connection pool.
trans-unit.target: 从连接池中提取连接或将连接返回到连接池时，服务器上不会引发登录和注销事件，这是因为在将连接返回到连接池时实际上并没有将其关闭。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [SQL Server Connection Pooling (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[SQL Server 连接池 (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md)。

trans-unit.source: Do not call `Close` or `Dispose` on a Connection, a DataReader, or any other managed object in the `Finalize` method of your class.
trans-unit.target: 不要调用`Close`或`Dispose`连接、 DataReader 或在任何其他托管的对象上`Finalize`你类的方法。

trans-unit.source: In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly.
trans-unit.target: 在终结器中，你应仅释放类直接拥有的非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a `Finalize` method in your class definition.
trans-unit.target: 如果类不拥有任何非托管资源，则不要在类定义中包含 `Finalize` 方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Garbage Collection](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/22b6cb97-0c80-4eeb-a2cf-5ed7655e37f9).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[垃圾回收](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/22b6cb97-0c80-4eeb-a2cf-5ed7655e37f9)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>, opens it, displays some of its properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>、 将其打开、 显示它的一些属性。

trans-unit.source: The connection is automatically closed at the end of the `using` block.
trans-unit.target: 连接会自动关闭的末尾`using`块。

trans-unit.source: The connection-level error that occurred while opening the connection.
trans-unit.target: 打开连接时出现的连接级别的错误。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time-to-live for column encryption key entries in the column encryption key cache for the [Always Encrypted](/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/always-encrypted-database-engine) feature.
trans-unit.target: 在用于 [Always Encrypted](/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/always-encrypted-database-engine) 功能的列加密密钥缓存中，获取或设置列加密密钥项的生存时间。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 2 hours.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 2 小时。

trans-unit.source: 0 means no caching at all.
trans-unit.target: 0 表示无缓存。

trans-unit.source: The time interval.
trans-unit.target: 时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether query metadata caching is enabled (true) or not (false) for parameterized queries running against [Always Encrypted](/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/always-encrypted-database-engine) enabled databases.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示对参数化查询（针对已启用 [Always Encrypted](/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/always-encrypted-database-engine) 的数据库运行）已启用 (True) 还是未启用 (False) 查询元数据缓存。

trans-unit.source: The default value is true.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 true。

trans-unit.source: Returns true if query metadata caching is enabled; otherwise false.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用查询元数据缓存，则返回 True；否则返回 False。

trans-unit.source: true is the default.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 True。

trans-unit.source: For parameterized queries, SqlClient makes a roundtrip to SQL Server for parameter metadata, to see which parameter it needs to encrypt and how (which keys and algorithms should be used).
trans-unit.target: 对于参数化查询，SqlClient 往返将向发出 SQL Server 的参数元数据，以查看它需要加密的参数以及如何 （应使用哪个密钥和算法）。

trans-unit.source: If the application calls the same query multiple times, an extra roundtrip is made to the server each time, which degrades application performance.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序调用相同的查询多个时间，一个额外往返生成指向服务器的每个时，这会降低应用程序性能。

trans-unit.source: With **ColumnEncryptionQueryMetadataCacheEnabled** set to true, if the same query is called multiple times, the roundtrip to the server will be made only once.
trans-unit.target: 与**ColumnEncryptionQueryMetadataCacheEnabled**设置为 true，如果多次调用了相同的查询，到服务器往返将进行一次。

trans-unit.source: The cache has a non-configurable Max size parameter that is set to 2000 queries.
trans-unit.target: 缓存中有一个非可配置的最大大小参数，设置为 2000年查询。

trans-unit.source: Allows you to set a list of trusted key paths for a database server.
trans-unit.target: 允许你设置数据库服务器的受信任密钥路径列表。

trans-unit.source: If while processing an application query the driver receives a key path that is not on the list, the query will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果在处理应用程序查询时驱动程序接收到不位于列表中的密钥路径，则查询会失败。

trans-unit.source: This property provides additional protection against security attacks that involve a compromised SQL Server providing fake key paths, which may lead to leaking key store credentials.
trans-unit.target: 此属性针对安全攻击提供附加保护，这些安全攻击涉及提供伪造密钥路径的受威胁的 SQL Server，可能导致密钥存储凭据泄露。

trans-unit.source: The list of trusted master key paths for the column encryption.
trans-unit.target: 适用于列加密的受信任主密钥路径的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string used to open a [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] database.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于打开 [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] 数据库的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The connection string that includes the source database name, and other parameters needed to establish the initial connection.
trans-unit.target: 连接字符串，其中包含源数据库名称和建立初始连接所需的其他参数。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> is similar to an OLE DB connection string, but is not identical.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>类似于一个 OLE DB 连接字符串，但并不完全相同。

trans-unit.source: Unlike OLE DB or ADO, the connection string that is returned is the same as the user-set <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>, minus security information if the Persist Security Info value is set to `false` (default).
trans-unit.target: 与 OLE DB 或 ADO，不同的连接字符串，则返回等同于用户设置<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>，安全信息如果 Persist Security Info 值设置为减`false`（默认值）。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] Data Provider for [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] does not persist or return the password in a connection string unless you set Persist Security Info to `true`.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]数据提供程序[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]不会保留或返回一个连接字符串中的密码，除非 Persist Security Info 设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> property to connect to a database.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>属性，以连接到数据库。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates a typical connection string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示一个典型的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: Use the new <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> to construct valid connection strings at run time.
trans-unit.target: 使用新<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>可以在运行时构造有效的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Connection String Builders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-string-builders.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[连接字符串生成器](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-string-builders.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> property can be set only when the connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>关闭连接时，才可以设置属性。

trans-unit.source: Many of the connection string values have corresponding read-only properties.
trans-unit.target: 连接字符串值的许多具有相应的只读属性。

trans-unit.source: When the connection string is set, these properties are updated, except when an error is detected.
trans-unit.target: 当设置连接字符串时，将更新这些属性，除非当检测到错误。

trans-unit.source: In this case, none of the properties are updated.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，不会更新任何属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> properties return only those settings that are contained in the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> 属性返回中包含的那些设置<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To connect to a local computer, specify "(local)" for the server.
trans-unit.target: 若要连接到本地计算机，指定"(local)"的服务器。

trans-unit.source: If a server name is not specified, a connection will be attempted to the default instance on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定服务器名称，将尝试连接到本地计算机上的默认实例。

trans-unit.source: Resetting the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> on a closed connection resets all connection string values (and related properties) including the password.
trans-unit.target: 重置<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>关闭的连接将重置所有连接字符串值 （和相关的属性） 包括密码。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set a connection string that includes "Database= AdventureWorks", and then reset the connection string to "Data Source=myserver;Integrated Security=true", the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Database%2A> property is no longer set to "AdventureWorks".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你设置的连接字符串，包括"数据库 = AdventureWorks"，然后重置的连接字符串"数据源 = myserver; 集成的安全性 = true"，则<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Database%2A>属性不能再设置为"AdventureWorks"。

trans-unit.source: The connection string is parsed immediately after being set.
trans-unit.target: 在设置之后立即分析连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: If errors in syntax are found when parsing, a runtime exception, such as <xref:System.ArgumentException>, is generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果在分析时，运行时异常，如发现语法中的错误<xref:System.ArgumentException>，生成。

trans-unit.source: Other errors can be found only when an attempt is made to open the connection.
trans-unit.target: 仅当尝试打开连接时，可以找到其他错误。

trans-unit.source: The basic format of a connection string includes a series of keyword/value pairs separated by semicolons.
trans-unit.target: 连接字符串的基本格式包含一系列的用分号分隔的关键字/值对。

trans-unit.source: The equal sign (=) connects each keyword and its value.
trans-unit.target: 每个关键字和它的值之间用等号 (=) 连接。

trans-unit.source: To include values that contain a semicolon, single-quote character, or double-quote character, the value must be enclosed in double quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 若要包含的值包含分号、 单引号字符或双引号字符，则该值必须括在双引号内。

trans-unit.source: If the value contains both a semicolon and a double-quote character, the value can be enclosed in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果值包含分号和双引号字符，则该值可以括在单引号中。

trans-unit.source: The single quotation mark is also useful if the value starts with a double-quote character.
trans-unit.target: 单引号也是有用的值以双引号字符开头。

trans-unit.source: Conversely, the double quotation mark can be used if the value starts with a single quotation mark.
trans-unit.target: 相反，如果值以单引号开头，则可以使用双引号。

trans-unit.source: If the value contains both single-quote and double-quote characters, the quotation mark character used to enclose the value must be doubled every time it occurs within the value.
trans-unit.target: 如果值包含单引号和双引号字符，每次它的值中发生时，用于将值括起来的引号字符必须采用双重方括号。

trans-unit.source: To include preceding or trailing spaces in the string value, the value must be enclosed in either single quotation marks or double quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 若要包含前导或尾随空格的字符串值，则该值必须括在单引号或双引号中。

trans-unit.source: Any leading or trailing spaces around integer, Boolean, or enumerated values are ignored, even if enclosed in quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 忽略任何前导空格或尾随空格围绕整数、 布尔值或枚举的值，即使用引号引起来。

trans-unit.source: However, spaces within a string literal keyword or value are preserved.
trans-unit.target: 但是，将保留在字符串文字关键字或值中的空间。

trans-unit.source: Single or double quotation marks may be used within a connection string without using delimiters (for example, Data Source= my'Server or Data Source= my"Server), unless a quotation mark character is the first or last character in the value.
trans-unit.target: 而不使用分隔符，可能在连接字符串中使用单引号或双引号引号 (例如，数据源 = my'Server 或数据源 = 我的"服务器)，除非引号字符的值中的第一个或最后一个字符。

trans-unit.source: Keywords are not case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 关键字不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the valid names for keyword values within the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了中的关键字值的有效名称<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following list contains the valid names for connection pooling values within the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 以下列表包含的连接池内的值的有效名称<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [SQL Server Connection Pooling (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[SQL Server 连接池 (ADO.NET)](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql-server-connection-pooling.md)。

trans-unit.source: Connection Lifetime (or Load Balance Timeout)
trans-unit.target: Connection Lifetime （或 Load Balance Timeout）

trans-unit.source: Enlist
trans-unit.target: Enlist

trans-unit.source: Max Pool Size
trans-unit.target: Max Pool Size

trans-unit.source: Min Pool Size
trans-unit.target: Min Pool Size

trans-unit.source: Pooling
trans-unit.target: Pooling

trans-unit.source: When you are setting keyword or connection pooling values that require a Boolean value, you can use 'yes' instead of 'true', and 'no' instead of 'false'.
trans-unit.target: 在设置关键字或连接池需要一个布尔值的值时，你可以是使用而不是 'true'，和否而不是 'false'。

trans-unit.source: Integer values are represented as strings.
trans-unit.target: 整数值表示为字符串。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] Data Provider for [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] uses its own protocol to communicate with [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 用于 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的 [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] 数据提供程序使用其自己的协议与 [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] 进行通信。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it does not support the use of an ODBC data source name (DSN) when connecting to [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] because it does not add an ODBC layer.
trans-unit.target: 因此，它不支持使用 ODBC 数据源名称 (DSN) 的连接时到[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]因为它不会添加一个 ODBC 层。

trans-unit.source: Universal data link (UDL) files are not supported for the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] Data Provider for [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 不支持通用数据链接 (UDL) 文件[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]数据提供程序[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: In this release, the application should use caution when constructing a connection string based on user input (for example when retrieving user ID and password information from a dialog box, and appending it to the connection string).
trans-unit.target: 在此版本中，应用程序时应小心构造根据用户输入 （例如，从一个对话框，并将其追加到连接字符串中检索用户 ID 和密码信息时） 的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The application should make sure that a user cannot embed additional connection string parameters in these values (for example, entering a password as "validpassword;database=somedb" in an attempt to attach to a different database).
trans-unit.target: 应用程序应确保用户不能嵌入在这些值中的其他连接字符串参数 (例如，输入一个密码作为"validpassword; 数据库 = somedb"尝试附加到不同数据库中)。

trans-unit.source: If you need to construct connection strings based on user input, use the new <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>, which validates the connection string and helps to eliminate this problem.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要构造基于用户输入的连接字符串，使用新<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>，它验证的连接字符串，并有助于避免此问题。

trans-unit.source: See [Connection String Builders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-string-builders.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[连接字符串生成器](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-string-builders.md)有关详细信息。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>和设置<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>之前打开连接的属性。

trans-unit.source: An invalid connection string argument has been supplied, or a required connection string argument has not been supplied.
trans-unit.target: 提供了一个无效的连接字符串参数，或者未提供所需的连接字符串参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the time to wait while trying to establish a connection before terminating the attempt and generating an error.
trans-unit.target: 获取终止尝试并生成错误之前在尝试建立连接时所等待的时间。

trans-unit.source: The time (in seconds) to wait for a connection to open.
trans-unit.target: 等待连接打开所需的时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 15 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 15 秒。

trans-unit.source: You can set the amount of time a connection waits to time out by using the `Connect Timeout` or `Connection Timeout` keywords in the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过使用连接等待的时间量设置为超时`Connect Timeout`或`Connection Timeout`连接字符串中的关键字。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 indicates no limit, and should be avoided in a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A> because an attempt to connect waits indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 值为 0 表示没有限制，，应当避免在<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>由于尝试连接将无限期等待。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> and sets the `Connection Timeout` to 30 seconds in the connection string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>和设置`Connection Timeout`到连接字符串中的 30 秒。

trans-unit.target: 该代码打开连接，并显示<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionTimeout%2A>在控制台窗口中的属性。

trans-unit.source: The value set is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 设置的值小于 0。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> object associated with the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回与 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential" /> object for this connection.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此连接的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential" /> object for this connection.
trans-unit.target: 此连接的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: `Persist Security Info = true` is required to get the value of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential> object with <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A>.
trans-unit.target: `Persist Security Info = true` 获取的值所需<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCredential>对象<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A> is null.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A>为 null。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception will be raised:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>将引发异常：

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A> is set on an open connection.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A>对打开的连接设置。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A> is set when `Context Connection=true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A>时会设置`Context Connection=true`。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A> is set when `Integrated Security = true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A>时会设置`Integrated Security = true`。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A> is set when the connection string uses `Password`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A>时使用的连接字符串设置`Password`。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A> is set when the connection string uses `UserID`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Credential%2A>时使用的连接字符串设置`UserID`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the current database or the database to be used after a connection is opened.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前数据库的名称或打开连接后要使用的数据库的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the current database or the name of the database to be used after a connection is opened.
trans-unit.target: 当前数据库的名称或打开连接后要使用的数据库的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Database%2A> property updates dynamically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.Database%2A>属性会动态更新。

trans-unit.source: If you change the current database using a [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)] statement or the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ChangeDatabase%2A> method, an informational message is sent and the property is updated automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果你更改当前的数据库使用[!INCLUDE[tsql](~/includes/tsql-md.md)]语句或<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ChangeDatabase%2A>方法，发送一条信息性消息，并自动更新的属性。
